name.ja: スカルライズ・ヴァイオレント

effect.en: Ritual Summon "Souffraruda the Defiant Soulclad Scripture" by sending face-up Zombie Type monsters from your field to the Graveyard whose total Levels equal 3 or more as material (you cannot use more monsters than necessary as material). Then, if you sent a monster whose original name is "Souffraes the Defiant Soul" to the Graveyard by this effect, you can draw 1 card.
